menuAnalyzer.explanationToggleLabel: How does your Menu get Analyzed?
menuAnalyzer.explanationContent: Our AI analyzes your menu using a multi-step process, evaluating design, structure, layout, and readability. It analyzes up to 150 different points from your menu and provides detailed explanations on why this is beneficial or not for your business. Insights are generated based on scientific research and industry best practices.
